= User Guide =

==DHEV Validators==
|| *Validator* || *Params* || *Message* || *Description* ||
|| AfterEL || value<br/>includeLimit<br/>message || validator.after || date must be after a certain value: date >= _value_ ||
|| AssertEL || value<br/>message || validator.assert || verifies a boolean value is true|false: booleanField == _value_ ||
|| BeforeEL || value<br/>includeLimit<br/>message || validator.before || date must be before a certain value: date <= _value_ || 
|| DecimalMaxEL || value<br/>includeLimit<br/>message || validator.max || max value for a decimal number: number <= _value_ ||
|| DecimalMinEL || value<br/>includeLimit<br/>message || validator.min || min value for a decimal number: number >= _value_ ||
|| DecimalRangeEL || min<br/>max<br/>includeMin<br/>includeMax<br/>message || validator.range || decimal number must be in this range, aka between min and max: _min_ <= number <= _max_ ||
|| DigitsEL || maxIntegerDigits<br/>minIntegerDigits<br/>maxFractionalDigits<br/>minFractionalDigits<br/>message|| validator.digits || numeric field must have a number of integer and fractional digits in certain ranges ||
|| LengthEL || min<br/>max<br/>includeMin<br/>includeMax<br/>message || validator.length || length of a string must be between min and max: _min_ <= string.length <= _max_ ||
|| MaxEL || value<br/>includeLimit<br/>message || validator.max || max value for an integer number: number <= _value_ ||
|| MinEL || value<br/>includeLimit<br/>message || validator.min || min value for an integer number: number >= _value_ ||
|| PatternEL || regex<br/>flags<br/>message<br/> || validator.pattern || verify that a string matches a pattern ||
|| RangeEL || min<br/>max<br/>includeMin<br/>includeMax<br/>message || validator.range || integer number must be in this range, aka between min and max: _min_ <= number <= _max_ ||
|| SizeEL || min<br/>max<br/>message || validator.size || size of a collection must be between min and max: _min_ <= collection.size <= _max_ ||
